name: Total Promotion (Jam Entry)
description:
The game is in early alpha stage and needs much more work so things can change a lot still. This game is the outcome of the GameDev.tv Jam 2022.

Your goal is to fight through the ranks of your superiors and become CEO. You only get a promotion when you defeat someone that has a higher rank than you.

When you get hit, the level automatically starts from the beginning. Try to defeat all NPCs on the map and become a CEO.

HP is currently not working and every character has only 1 HP.

For a good experience, use the fullscreen mode.

The source code can be inspected here.
